scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test:only
scripts.reactrouter:clean: rimraf node_modules/react-router node_modules/react-router-dom node_modules/react node_modules/react-dom node_modules/react-addons-test-utils
scripts.reactrouter:13: npm run reactrouter:clean && npm i react-router@0.13.6 react@0.13 && npm install
scripts.reactrouter:3: npm run reactrouter:clean && npm i react-router@3.0.2 react@0.14.8 && npm install
scripts.reactrouter:4: npm run reactrouter:clean && npm i react-router-dom@4.0.0 react@15.4.2 && npm install
